description: React component for handling onboarding documents, including PDF generation, local storage management, and submission logic.

methods.name: ensurePdfLibs
methods.description: Loads PDF libraries (html2canvas and jsPDF) dynamically from CDN if available.

methods.name: normalizePdfDataUrl
methods.description: Validates and sanitizes a PDF data URL string.

methods.name: renderPdfDataUrlFromHtml
methods.description: Renders HTML content into a PDF and returns a base64 data URL.

methods.name: buildDocHtmlSnapshots
methods.description: Builds minimal HTML snapshots for documents from localStorage data.
